services.name: AC Repair Service
services.description: Professional AC repair and maintenance service. Our expert technicians provide comprehensive AC repair solutions including refrigerant recharge, compressor repair, filter replacement, and general maintenance to keep your air conditioning system running efficiently.

services.name: AC Maintenance Inquiry
services.description: AC maintenance service - quote based on requirements. Get customized maintenance plans for your air conditioning units. Our service includes regular check-ups, cleaning, and preventive maintenance to ensure optimal performance and longevity of your AC systems.

services.name: Home Renovation Service
services.description: Complete home renovation service. Transform your living space with our comprehensive home renovation solutions. We handle everything from planning and design to execution, including interior remodeling, structural changes, flooring, painting, and finishing work.

services.name: Building Renovation Inquiry
services.description: Building renovation service - quote based on project requirements. Professional building renovation services for commercial and residential properties. We provide detailed project planning, cost estimation, and execution for complete building makeovers including structural repairs, facade renovation, and interior upgrades.
